mapper.select: select goods.*, sc.machine_id, sc.code channelCode, sc.volume_count, sc.goods_count, sc.name channelName, sc.status channelStatus from inno72_goods goods inner join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on scg.goods_id=goods.id inner join inno72_supply_channel sc on scg.supply_channel_id=sc.id inner join inno72_machine m on sc.machine_id=m.id inner join inno72_check_user_machine sum on sum.machine_id=m.id inner join inno72_check_user cu on sum.check_user_id=cu.id inner join view_machine_goods mg on mg.machine_id=m.id where cu.id=#{checkUserId} and m.machine_status=4 and sc.is_delete=0 and sc.is_remove=0

select goods.* from inno72_interact_machine_goods mg inner join inno72_goods goods on goods.id=mg.goods_id inner join inno72_interact_machine im on mg.interact_machine_id=im.id inner join inno72_interact_machine_time mt on im.id=mt.interact_machine_id and now() BETWEEN mt.start_time AND mt.end_time where im.machine_id=#{machineId} and now() BETWEEN mg.start_time and mg.end_time
